description:
Seeking an EXPERIENCED Accounts Payable Specialist in Santa Monica, CA.
  • Contract to hire
  • $21-24/hour


Areas of Responsibility Include:

  • Responsible for the Company’s Accounts Payable.
  • Monitor bank account activity, cash balances, banking transactions, cash flow management/projection and month end reconciliations.
  • Weekly check runs - Initiate wires, EFTs, ACHs and other funds transfers
  • 3 way match and code invoices
  • Perform vendor management
  • 1099 reporting for vendors.
  • Own the expense reporting process from start to the end.
  • Assist in month-end close reconciliation for management companies.


Education/Experience/Soft Skills:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting preferable, not required
  • Very strong Accounts Payable experience/skills - full scope of accounts payable experience required
  • Strong Excel Skills
  • Professional demeanor
  • Strong communication and relationship skills
